Message:
The streets were alive
with cheers and laughter,
when suddenly...

There’s something
weird about this fog...
I’ve got a very bad
feeling about this...

Someone said the words
that fanned the flames
of everyone’s anxiety,

and the fog started to
thicken in response.

The smiles started to
fade away...one by one.

I wonder what my
circus troupemates would
do at a time like this...

They’d probably say,
“Let’s put on a show that’ll
make everyone smile so hard,
they’ll forget whatever
they were worrying about.”

Fun memories are precious,
and I won’t let any scary ones
take them away.

“Alright, everyone!
All eyes and ears on me!”
